protein.specific_function: May be involved in transport between a perinuclear compartment and the plasma membrane, apparently linked to the ABCA1-mediated cholesterol secretion pathway

reference.reference_text: Jacobs S, Schilf C, Fliegert F, Koling S, Weber Y, Schurmann A, Joost HG: ADP-ribosylation factor (ARF)-like 4, 6, and 7 represent a subgroup of the ARF family characterization by rapid nucleotide exchange and a nuclear localization signal. FEBS Lett. 1999 Aug 13;456(3):384-8.
